name: redraw
description: redraw count add 2

name: upright
description: when tell fortune with all cards up, add 2 redraw today

name: down
description: when tell fortune with all cards down, add 2 money

name: rest
description: when a day over, add 1 sanity

name: Shopaholic
description: when buy anything in shop, add 1 sanity

name: abstinence
description: when not buy anything in shop, add 2 money

name: Enlightener
description: when satisfy all customer a day, add 3 sanity

name: Insurance
description: when failed all customer a day, add 3 money

name: emotionToSanity
description: extra emotion over customer requirement would be added to Sanity

name: powerToMoney
description: extra power over customer requirement would be added to Money

name: wisdomToRedraw
description: extra wisdom over customer requirement would be added to redraw

name: unusedRedrawKeep
description: unused redraw will go to next day

name: healSanity
description: set sanity to 10

name: lastSanity
description: The first time sanity goes below 0, recover it to 5

name: lastValue
description: deprecated

name: finger
description: flip a card

name: balance
description: when tell fortune with no sanity change, add 1 sanity

name: twinLight
description: when tell fortune with both Moon and Sun cards, add 1 money

name: stress tolerance
description: your sanity can go under 0, as long as you can recover it over 0 before the end of day

name: preview
description: preview next card
